definitions.body: = bring injury or ruin to, abs Pr 4:16; of punishment Ps 64:9 (indef. Subj.; si vera l.; text prob. corrupt, v. Che Bae).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: only Pt. [[והיו מֻכְשָׁלִים לְפָנֶיְ]] Je 18:23 either and let them be ones who have stumbled before thee, i.e. regard them as such (Hi Gf VB), or and let them be ones overthrown before thee (Gie; so Qr acc. to Gf). So also in Ez Eze 21:20 acc. to Co, cf. Sm Da (MT [[מִכְשׁׂלִים]], v. [[מִכְשׁוֹל]]).
